column1: Happy #SmallBusinessSaturday!  This holiday season please support our small businesses during these difficult times.
The American people can’t wait any longer. We need more COVID relief. https://t.co/pI5NgLFQ4r

This holiday season please stay safe and adhere to CDC guidelines. Remember the 3 Ws to: - Wear your mask. - Watch your distance stay 6 feet apart from others. - Wash your hands for a least 20 seconds.
Thank you to all who have served. #VeteransDay https://t.co/CmGdT5lkPo

The American people have spoken. Congratulations to President-elect Biden! I’m looking forward to working with him and his administration. It’s time for us to get to work unify the country and defeat this pandemic.
President Trump is lying to the American people. This isn’t voter fraud or illegal. This is democracy at work.
Counting every vote is what democracy is about. The Presidential election isn’t decided yet. Mail in ballots aren’t illegal.
Be patient. We need to count every vote cast.

The Administration has failed to make a plan for America during the public health crisis and even let it run rampant through their own White House. We need leadership who will listen to science and do what's best for our country.
